name: Corkboard
description:
Corkboard is a puzzle game created for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam. The core mechanic of the game, inspired by the theme "joined together", is pinning bits of paper (mechanically, movable, physics-based platforms) to a corkboard. The player must create and adapt a path with limited resources to make their way through each level and recover the shattered pieces of a picture.

Game design by Carson and Trevor Swope

Music/FX by Madison Butler

This is our first game and first game jam, and was also an avenue for us to learn Godot, which we thoroughly enjoyed
